info.name: Fitassist API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for Fitassist Backend - Spring Boot REST API

Authentication: Cookie-based JWT. Login via POST /api/users/login — the server sets  and  as HTTP-only cookies automatically. Postman stores and sends these cookies on all subsequent requests with no manual configuration needed.

Base URL:  — set via environment variable. Use the **Dev** environment for local development and **Prod** for production.

request.description:
Register a new user.

**gender** options: MALE, FEMALE, OTHER
**activityLevel** options: SEDENTARY, LIGHTLY_ACTIVE, MODERATELY_ACTIVE, VERY_ACTIVE, EXTRA_ACTIVE
**goal** options: WEIGHT_LOSS, MUSCLE_GAIN, MAINTENANCE

Authenticate via cookie-based JWT.

The `username` field accepts the user's **email address**.

On success the server sets two HTTP-only cookies:
- `accessToken` — valid for 15 minutes
- `refreshToken` — valid for 7 days

Postman automatically stores and re-sends these cookies. No manual token handling required.
Invalidate the current session / refresh token cookie.
Obtain a new access token using the refresh token stored in an HTTP-only cookie (set automatically on login).
Get the authenticated user's own profile. Requires a valid session cookie (set automatically on login).
Get a user's full profile by ID. Requires account owner or admin role.
Get the public author profile of a user (limited fields, visible to all authenticated users).

Full update of a user profile. Requires account owner or admin.

Provide `oldPassword` when changing the password.
Delete a user account. Requires account owner or admin.
Sends a password reset email with a one-time token.
Submit the reset token from the email along with the new password.

Create a new food item. **Admin only.**

All macros are per 100 g by default.

Filter foods using criteria.

**dataOption** options: ALL, ANY
**operation** options: EQUALS, CONTAINS, GREATER_THAN, LESS_THAN, etc.
Calculate macros for a given quantity (in grams) of a food.
Partial update of a food item. **Admin only.**
Delete a food item. **Admin only.**

Create a new exercise. **Admin only.**

- `expertiseLevelId` — references an expertise level category
- `equipmentId` — optional, references equipment category
- `mechanicsTypeId` — optional, references mechanics type
- `forceTypeId` — optional, references force type
- `targetMuscleIds` — list of muscle category IDs
- `instructions` / `tips` — ordered text steps
Returns all category groupings relevant to exercises (muscle groups, equipment, mechanics, force types, expertise levels).
Partial update of an exercise. **Admin only.**
Delete an exercise. **Admin only.**

Create a new activity. **Admin only.**

- `met` — Metabolic Equivalent of Task value
- `categoryId` — activity category ID

Calculate calories burned for an activity.

- `time` — duration in minutes (Short)
- `weight` — body weight in kg
Partial update of an activity. **Admin only.**
Delete an activity. **Admin only.**

Get all categories of a given type.

**categoryType** enum values: EXERCISE, FOOD, FORUM_THREAD

item.name: Get Category by Type and ID

request.description: Create a new category of the specified type. **Admin only.**
Partial update of a category. **Admin only.**
Delete a category. **Admin only.**

Create a new workout plan.

- `isPublic` — true = visible to all users
- `planStructureType` options: WEEKLY, DAILY, CUSTOM
- `categoryIds` — list of category IDs to tag the plan
- `instructions` — ordered instruction steps
- `workouts` — optional nested workout objects
Get a plan by ID. Public plans are accessible to all. Private plans require owner or admin.
Returns all category groupings available for plans.
Partial update of a plan. Requires plan owner, admin, or moderator.
Increment the view counter of a plan.
Delete a plan. Requires plan owner, admin, or moderator.

Create a new recipe.

- `minutesToPrepare` — total prep time in minutes
- `isPublic` — true = visible to all users
- `categoryIds` — list of category IDs
- `instructions` — ordered instruction steps
Get a recipe by ID. Public recipes are accessible to all. Private require owner or admin.
Partial update of a recipe. Requires owner, admin, or moderator.
Increment the view counter of a recipe.
Delete a recipe. Requires owner, admin, or moderator.

Add one or more foods to a recipe. Requires recipe owner, admin, or moderator.

`quantity` is in grams.
Replace all existing foods in a recipe with a new list. Requires recipe owner, admin, or moderator.
Update quantity of a specific food in a recipe. Requires recipe owner, admin, or moderator.
Remove a specific food from a recipe. Requires recipe owner, admin, or moderator.
Create a comment on a forum thread. Set `parentCommentId` to reply to another comment.
Get top-level (root) comments for a thread, paginated.
Get all direct replies to a specific comment.
Get the full ancestor chain of a comment (parent, grandparent, etc.).
Update comment text. Requires comment owner, admin, or moderator.
Delete a comment. Requires comment owner, admin, or moderator.

Create a new forum thread.

Note: the body field is `text` (not `content`) and the category field is `threadCategoryId`.
Partial update of a thread. Requires thread owner, admin, or moderator.
Delete a forum thread. Requires thread owner, admin, or moderator.

Upload a media file (image) linked to a parent entity.

**IMPORTANT:** This is a `multipart/form-data` request, NOT JSON.

**parentType** enum values: RECIPE, PLAN, EXERCISE, USER, FORUM_THREAD

Requires owner, admin, or moderator role.
Get all media items linked to a parent entity.
Get the first (thumbnail) media item for a parent entity.
Delete a media item. Requires owner, admin, or moderator.

item.name: Get Saved Items by Type and Interaction

request.description:
Get a user's saved/liked items of a specific type and interaction.

**itemType** options: PLAN, RECIPE, COMMENT, FORUM_THREAD
**type** options: LIKE, SAVE

item.name: Get All Saved Items (no interaction filter)

request.description: Like or save an item with a specific interaction type.
Get all food entries for a specific date. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

Add a food item to the daily food cart.

- `quantity` — amount in grams
- `date` — the day this food was consumed (YYYY-MM-DD)
Update the quantity of a food in the daily cart. Requires cart owner.
Remove a food entry from the daily cart. Requires cart owner.
Get all activity entries for a specific date. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.

Log an activity for a specific date.

- `time` — duration in minutes
- `weight` — user's weight in kg (used for calorie calculation)
- `date` — the day of the activity (YYYY-MM-DD)
Update the duration of a logged activity. Requires cart owner.
Remove an activity from the daily log. Requires cart owner.
Get a calorie and macro summary for the authenticated user on a specific date.

Get an aggregated report over a date range.

**Query params:** `fromDate` and `toDate` (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
Get daily activity counts for the authenticated user, suitable for rendering a heatmap calendar.

Submit a complaint against a piece of content.

- `reason` — ComplaintReason enum (e.g. INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT, SPAM, HARASSMENT)
- `parentId` — ID of the reported content
- `subClass` — ComplaintSubClass enum: PLAN, RECIPE, COMMENT, FORUM_THREAD, USER
Get all complaints paginated. **Admin or Moderator only.**
Get a specific complaint by ID. **Admin or Moderator only.**
Mark a complaint as resolved. **Admin or Moderator only.**

Global search endpoint.

**Query params:**
- `query` (required) — search term
- `type` (optional) — filter to a specific content type
- `limit` (optional, default: 10) — max number of results
Get a pre-signed S3 URL for a stored image by its file name.
Returns Caffeine cache statistics: hit rate, miss count, eviction count, and cache size.
Returns info about the current thread: `id`, `isVirtual`, `name`. Useful to verify Java 21 virtual threads are active.
